mapper.select: SELECT * FROM task WHERE not deleted=1 ORDER BY createtime DESC
SELECT * FROM task WHERE not deleted=1 AND (owner="${username}" OR creator="${username}") ORDER BY createtime DESC
SELECT * FROM task WHERE taskdone = 1 AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY createtime
SELECT * FROM task WHERE taskdone = 1 AND deleted = 0 AND owner="${username}" ORDER BY createtime
SELECT * FROM task WHERE task.prepared=0 AND not deleted=1
SELECT taskscore FROM task WHERE taskid = #{taskid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task (taskname, owner, creator, modifier) VALUES (#{taskname}, #{owner}, #{creator}, #{modifier})
INSERT INTO rank (taskname, owner, score, reason) VALUES (#{taskname}, #{owner}, #{score}, #{reason})
mapper.select: SELECT owner, SUM(score) as totalscores, COUNT(owner) as exetimes FROM rank GROUP BY owner ORDER BY totalscores DESC, exetimes
